revised_title: Cathode Ray Deflection and the Discovery of Para-cathodic and Dia-cathodic Rays
tldr: This article discusses the author's experiments on cathode rays and their deflection by electric charges. The author also discovers para-cathodic and dia-cathodic rays, which are emitted from the anti-cathode and have different properties compared to the ortho-cathodic rays. These findings contribute to the understanding of the behavior of cathode rays and the development of related technologies.
